content: this lacy fashion statement features two of the beautiful yarns produced by peace fleece baku black and bedouin blue purchase of these yarns supports some wonderful projects around the world encouraging peace between traditional enemies the pattern has been tested by several ravelers and works up in less than 3 hours for most crocheters if you choose to substitute yarns any worsted will work in place of the black but the blue in this design is a heavier weight than most worsteds so an aran or light bulky would work best to maintain the shape of the hat
